message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product that I think you'll love. Would you like to buy it from me?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I'm willing to pay $95 for it.
I appreciate your willingness to pay $95, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product, which is the maximum I'm willing to spend.
I appreciate your willingness to pay $100, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. It's a fair price considering the value the product brings
